# Plot embedding

Plot embedding

## Usage

``` r
plot_embedding(
  matrix,
  labels = NULL,
  method = "pca",
  colors = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(length(unique(labels)), "Set1"),
  seed = 1,
  point_size = 1,
  cores = 1
)
```

## Arguments

- matrix:

  Input matrix.

- labels:

  Input labels.

- method:

  Method to use for dimensionality reduction.

- colors:

  Colors to use for the plot.

- seed:

  Seed for the random number generator.

- point_size:

  Size of the points.

- cores:

  Set the number of threads when setting for
  [uwot::umap](https://jlmelville.github.io/uwot/reference/umap.html)
  and [Rtsne::Rtsne](https://rdrr.io/pkg/Rtsne/man/Rtsne.html).

## Value

An embedding plot

## Examples

``` r
data(example_matrix)
samples_use <- 1:200
plot_data <- example_matrix[samples_use, ]
labels <- sample(
  c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E"),
  nrow(plot_data),
  replace = TRUE
)

plot_embedding(
  plot_data,
  labels,
  method = "pca",
  point_size = 2
)

  plot_data,
  labels,
  method = "tsne",
  point_size = 2
```
